title: Badlands goes bad-ass: National park‚Äôs climate tweets pop up ‚Ä¶ then disappear
text:
Badlands National Park tweeted the inconvenient truth about climate change today, at least temporarily, despite a Trump administration crackdown on environmental outreach. And the Twittersphere went wild.
The South Dakota park‚Äôs staff typically focuses its Twitter account of bighorn sheep and the like, but at least one of the account‚Äôs keepers delved into atmospheric carbon dioxide readings:


The tweetstorm was seen as brazen because the Interior Department and its National Park Service had already weathered a social-media freeze over Inauguration Day crowd estimates, and because word emerged that the Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Agriculture were told to put the brakes on social media and other forms of engagement.
